node.name: TrikV6EnginesBackward
node.description: Enables motors on the given ports in reverse mode with the given power. Ports are specified in accordance with TRIK controller notations (for example M1, E2) and divided by commas. The power is specified in percents with the number from -100 to 100, if negative number is specified then the motor is enabled in the usual mode.

node.name: TrikV6EnginesForward
node.description: Enables motors on the given ports with the given power. Ports are specified in accordance with TRIK controller notations (for example M1, E2) and divided by commas. The power is specified in percents with the number from -100 to 100, if negative number is specified then the motor is enabled in the reverse mode.

node.name: TrikAngularServo
node.description: Manages angular servomotor. Sets up rotation angle on the given port in degrees. Values from 0 to 90 are correspond to a clockwise rotation and values from -90 to 0 correspond to counterclockwise rotation.

node.name: TrikV6EnginesStop
node.description: Disables motors on the given ports.

node.name: TrikPlayTone
node.description: Plays on the robot a sound file (.wav or .mp3) previously uploaded to it.

node.name: TrikV6ClearEncoder
node.description: Nullifies tacho limit of the motors on the given ports.

node.name: TrikSystem
node.description: Invokes bash script-style command on the robot. If 'Evaluate' property is set to true then the value of 'Command' property is interpreted as a formula, otherwise it is interpreted as plain string.

node.name: TrikWriteToFile
node.description: Writes a given message to a file. File path may be absolute or relative to a directory containing TRIK Studio executable.

node.name: TrikRemoveFile
node.description: Removes a file. File path may be absolute or relative to a directory containing TRIK Studio executable.

node.name: TrikInitVideoStreaming
node.description: Enables video stream on robot. Video then can be watched on TRIK gamepad or in browser using URL http://ROBOT.IP.ADDRESS:8080/?action=stream

node.name: TrikInitCamera
node.description: Enables line or object or color detector by videocamera and draws videostream on the robot`s screen.

node.name: TrikDetect
node.description: Initializes videocamera line or object detector with the color of the object in the middle of the camera`s sight.

node.name: TrikDetectorToVariable
node.description: Stores videocamera line detector`s value into a given variable.

node.name: TrikLed
node.description: Sets the color of the LED on the robot`s front panel.

node.name: TrikWaitForLight
node.description: Waits till the value returned by the light sensor on the given port will be greater or less than the given in the 'Percents' parameter value (0 to 100).

node.name: TrikWaitForSonarDistance
node.description: Waits till the value returned by the ultrasonic sensor on the given port will be greater or less than the given in the 'Distance' parameter value (the distance is specified in centimeters, from 0 to 300).

node.name: TrikWaitForIRDistance
node.description: Waits till the value returned by the infrared sensor on the given port will be greater or less than the given in the 'Distance' parameter value. By default on ports A1 and A2 the distance is specified in centimeters (from 0 to 100). It is not recommended to plug IR sensor into other ports because its raw value will be processed by software on robot with expectation of another sensor type.

node.name: TrikWaitForTouchSensor
node.description: Waits till the touch sensor is pressed. The only parameter is a sensor`s port number (1, 2, 3 or 4).

node.name: TrikWaitForGyroscope
node.description: Waits till the value returned by the gyroscope on the given port will be greater or less than the given in the 'Degrees/sec' parameter value.

node.name: TrikWaitForMotion
node.description: Waits till the motion sensor on the given port is triggered.

node.name: TrikWaitForEncoder
node.description: Waits till the tacho limit of the motor on the given port will reach the value of the 'Tacho Limit' parameter.

node.name: TrikWaitForButton
node.description: Waits for press of a button on a brick.

node.name: TrikWaitGamepadButton
node.description: Waits for Android gamepad 'magic button' press. Buttons are identified by numbers from 1 to 5 (from left to right)

node.name: TrikWaitPadPress
node.description: Waits for Android gamepad pad press (left pad has number 1, right pad - number 2).

node.name: TrikWaitGamepadWheel
node.description: Waits till the value returned by gamepad wheel be greater or less than the given in the 'Angle' parameter value. Angle is measured from -100 (max left) to 100 (max right).

node.name: TrikWaitGamepadDisconnect
node.description: Waits until Android gamepad is disconnected.

node.name: TrikWaitGamepadConnect
node.description: Waits until Android gamepad is connected.

node.name: TrikSetPainterColor
node.description: Sets the painter color.

node.name: TrikSetPainterWidth
node.description: Sets the painter width.

node.name: TrikDrawPixel
node.description: Draws one pixel in the specified coordinates on the robot screen.

node.name: TrikDrawLine
node.description: Draws a segment on the robot screen. The parameters specify the ends of the segment.

node.name: TrikDrawRect
node.description: Draws a rectangle on the robot screen. The parameters specify the coordinates of top-left corner, the width and the height of the rectangle.

node.name: TrikDrawEllipse
node.description: Draws the ellipse defined by the rectangle beginning at (x, y) with the given width and height.

node.name: TrikDrawArc
node.description: Draws the arc defined by the rectangle beginning at (x, y) with the specified width and height, and the given startAngle and spanAngle.

node.name: TrikSmile
node.description: Draws a smile on the robot`s screen :)

node.name: TrikSadSmile
node.description: Draws a sad smile on the robot`s screen :(

node.name: TrikSetBackground
node.description: Sets the background color of the current picture on the robot`s screen.

node.name: TrikSay
node.description: Synthesizes the given phrase and plays it on the robot. If 'Evaluate' property is set to true then the value of 'Text' property is interpreted as a formula, otherwise it is interpreted as plain string.

node.name: TrikSendMessage
node.description: Sends message to another robot.

node.name: TrikWaitForMessage
node.description: Stores a message from another robot into a given variable. When no incoming messages are present at the moment, a robot will wait for incoming message if 'Synchronized' property is true, and empty string will be assigned to a variable otherwise.

node.name: TrikV62AngularServo
node.description: Manages angular servomotor. Sets up rotation angle on the given port in degrees. Values from 0 to 90 are correspond to a clockwise rotation and values from -90 to 0 correspond to counterclockwise rotation.

node.name: TrikV62ClearEncoder
node.description: Nullifies tacho limit of the motors on the given ports.

node.name: TrikV62WaitForEncoder
node.description: Waits till the tacho limit of the motor on the given port will reach the value of the 'Tacho Limit' parameter.
